EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that a request has been submitted to Managing Director for Initial Approval
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Initial Approval to Rep
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Submitted for Initial Approval: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
Your request has been submitted to your Managing Director for approval:
If approved, you will receive a notification of team assignment If rejected, you will receive an email notification
***Please note: pricing work will not begin until Managing Director approval is received.
Your Support Number is {!Case.CaseNumber}
You can click here to view the request via Salesforce.
Thank you,
Your Support Team
